meanings.sent1: The body metabolizes food to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She metabolizes nutrients from her meals.
meanings.sent3: The little robot metabolizes data to function properly.
meanings.sent4: Just like a machine, our body metabolizes various inputs.
meanings.sent5: Every living cell metabolizes to survive.

meanings.definition: To break down substances in the body for energy.
meanings.sent1: The digestive system metabolizes food for fuel.
meanings.sent3: The superhero metabolizes pizza slices into power.
meanings.sent4: Like a furnace, the body metabolizes food into usable energy.
meanings.sent5: The engine of our body metabolizes nutrients to keep us going.

meanings.sent1: Our body metabolizes food to create energy.
meanings.sent2: The cells metabolize glucose to fuel activities.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand metabolizes candy into magical strength.
meanings.sent4: Just like a power plant, our body metabolizes food into usable energy.
meanings.sent5: The process of metabolizing turns food into life-sustaining power.
